energy_generation_total.formula: agg_sum(generation.biomass) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(generation.geothermal) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(generation.marine) + agg_sum(generation.nuclear) + agg_sum(generation.other) + agg_sum(generation.other.renewable) + agg_sum(generation.solar) + agg_sum(generation.waste) + agg_sum(generation.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(generation.wind.onshore)

energy_consumption_total.formula: agg_sum(consumption.biomass) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(consumption.geothermal) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(consumption.marine) + agg_sum(consumption.nuclear) + agg_sum(consumption.other) + agg_sum(consumption.other.renewable) + agg_sum(consumption.solar) + agg_sum(consumption.waste) + agg_sum(consumption.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(consumption.wind.onshore)

energy_consumption_ratio.formula: safediv(agg_sum(consumption.biomass) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(consumption.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(consumption.geothermal) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(consumption.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(consumption.marine) + agg_sum(consumption.nuclear) + agg_sum(consumption.other) + agg_sum(consumption.other.renewable) + agg_sum(consumption.solar) + agg_sum(consumption.waste) + agg_sum(consumption.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(consumption.wind.onshore), agg_sum(generation.biomass) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(generation.geothermal) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(generation.marine) + agg_sum(generation.nuclear) + agg_sum(generation.other) + agg_sum(generation.other.renewable) + agg_sum(generation.solar) + agg_sum(generation.waste) + agg_sum(generation.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(generation.wind.onshore))

fossil_energy_generation_ratio.formula: safediv(agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat), agg_sum(generation.biomass) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(generation.geothermal) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(generation.marine) + agg_sum(generation.nuclear) + agg_sum(generation.other) + agg_sum(generation.other.renewable) + agg_sum(generation.solar) + agg_sum(generation.waste) + agg_sum(generation.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(generation.wind.onshore))

hydro_energy_generation_ratio.formula: safediv(agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir), agg_sum(generation.biomass) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(generation.geothermal) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(generation.marine) + agg_sum(generation.nuclear) + agg_sum(generation.other) + agg_sum(generation.other.renewable) + agg_sum(generation.solar) + agg_sum(generation.waste) + agg_sum(generation.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(generation.wind.onshore))

nuclear_energy_generation_ratio.formula: safediv(agg_sum(generation.nuclear), agg_sum(generation.biomass) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.brown_coal_lignite) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.coal_derived_gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.gas) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.hard_coal) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.oil_shale) + agg_sum(generation.fossil.peat) + agg_sum(generation.geothermal) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.pumped_storage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.run_of_river_and_poundage) + agg_sum(generation.hydro.water_reservoir) + agg_sum(generation.marine) + agg_sum(generation.nuclear) + agg_sum(generation.other) + agg_sum(generation.other.renewable) + agg_sum(generation.solar) + agg_sum(generation.waste) + agg_sum(generation.wind.offshore) + agg_sum(generation.wind.onshore))
